## Blog requirements
- [ ] article meta: tags, times, title, excerpt

GFM doesn't support:
* fontawesome
* toc
* math
* sup, sub, mark
* footnotes
* abbreviation



dksldjksl
      int i = 0

# Draft
```cpp
string s1 = regex_replace(s,regex("\\r(\\n|\\xc2\\x85)?|(\\xe2\\x90\\xa4|\\xe2\\x80\\xa8|\\xc2\\x85)"),"\n");
s1 = regex_replace(s1,regex("\\x00"),"\xef\xbf\xbd");
```
## Unicode 
尽可能选择utf-8, 当作单字节处理, 不要转成u32, u16. regex\_replace 一个utf-8字符可以通过regex\_replace 多个\x字符来完成.
由utf-8的编码规则可知, 任一ASCII中的字符的编码都不可能是其它任意字符编码的一部分. 可以说, utf-8编码是prefix, infix, postfix 编码. 因此, 处理utf-8字符时完全可以当作多个单字节来处理.
c\++中\u好像只能用在u32string, u16string中, 不能用于utf-8. utf-8可以用\x. \x 可以出现在任意字符串中, 但 \U和\u只能出现在 u16“”, u32“” 中. utf-8, utf-16, utf-32 对应的c\++ type 分别是unsigned char, unsigned short, unsigned int (int_32)
[What Every Programmer Absolutely, Positively Needs To Know About Encodings And Character Sets To Work With Text](http://kunststube.net/encoding/)
[字符编码笔记：ASCII，Unicode 和 UTF-8 (阮一峰)](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2007/10/ascii_unicode_and_utf-8.html)
[online converter](https://r12a.github.io/app-conversion/)

## Javascript
[I/O Models and event loop in javascript](https://acemood.github.io/2016/02/01/event-loop-in-javascript)

## C++

尽可能选择utf-8, 当作单字节处理, 不要转成u32, u16. regex\_replace 一个utf-8字符可以通过regex\_replace 多个\x字符来完成.
由utf-8的编码规则可知, 任一ASCII中的字符的编码都不可能是其它任意字符编码的一部分. 可以说, utf-8编码是prefix, infix, postfix 编码. 因此, 处理utf-8字符时完全可以当作多个单字节来处理.  
c\++中\u好像只能用在u32string, u16string中, 不能用于utf-8. utf-8可以用\x. \x 可以出现在任意字符串中, 但 \U和\u只能出现在 u16“”, u32“” 中. utf-8, utf-16, utf-32 对应的c\++ type 分别是unsigned char, unsigned short, unsigned int (int_32)

## Blog requirements
* [ ] article meta: tags, times, title, excerpt

GFM doesn't support:
* fontawesome
* toc
* math
* sup, sub, mark
* footnotes
* abbreviation

What do I want ?
- [ ] markdown-it built-it
- [ ] latex
- [ ] task-list
- [ ] subpage
- [ ] foot-note
- [ ] toggled list
- [ ] block anchor
- [ ] toc
- [ ] yaml
- [ ] doc meta: tag, catogory
- [ ] search
- [ ] block comment and tag
- [ ] block menu in preview
